editorialPolicy.commitmentText: CBD Portal is committed to providing accurate, evidence-based information about cannabidiol and related topics. We understand that health-related decisions require trustworthy information, and we take this responsibility seriously.
editorialPolicy.writersText: All content on CBD Portal is written by verified industry experts with real-world experience in CBD product development, research, or healthcare. Our authors have:
editorialPolicy.writersItem1: Demonstrated expertise in the CBD or cannabis industry
editorialPolicy.sourceText: We prioritize peer-reviewed research from reputable journals. Our primary sources include:
editorialPolicy.sourceItem4: Major medical journals (JAMA, BMJ, Lancet, etc.)
editorialPolicy.qualityText: We evaluate research quality based on:
editorialPolicy.qualityItem1: Study design (randomized controlled trials weighted highest)
editorialPolicy.balancedText: We present research findings honestly, including:
editorialPolicy.balancedItem3: Areas where evidence is limited or preliminary
editorialPolicy.balancedItem4: Clear distinction between human and animal studies
editorialPolicy.citationText: Every factual claim in our articles is supported by citations. We use:
editorialPolicy.citationItem1: Inline citations linking directly to source material
editorialPolicy.citationItem2: Reference lists at the end of each article
editorialPolicy.citationItem3: Clear attribution of quotes and statistics
editorialPolicy.disclaimerText: Our content is for informational purposes only. We always recommend that readers:
editorialPolicy.disclaimerItem1: Consult healthcare professionals before using CBD
editorialPolicy.disclaimerItem2: Discuss potential drug interactions with their doctor
editorialPolicy.disclaimerItem3: Not replace prescribed treatments with CBD
editorialPolicy.disclaimerItem4: Be cautious of any source making guaranteed health claims
editorialPolicy.updatesText: CBD research is rapidly evolving. We commit to:
editorialPolicy.updatesItem2: Updating content when significant new research emerges
editorialPolicy.updatesItem3: Clearly displaying "last updated" dates on all articles
editorialPolicy.updatesItem4: Noting when articles have been substantially revised
editorialPolicy.correctionsText: If we make an error, we will:
editorialPolicy.correctionsItem2: Note the correction at the bottom of the article
editorialPolicy.correctionsItem3: Preserve transparency about what was changed
editorialPolicy.correctionsLink: To report an error or suggest a correction, please
editorialPolicy.conflictsText: We believe in transparency. Our authors disclose:
editorialPolicy.conflictsItem1: Current or past employment in the CBD industry
editorialPolicy.conflictsItem3: Any relationships that could influence content
editorialPolicy.independenceText: CBD Portal maintains editorial independence. We:
editorialPolicy.independenceItem1: Do not accept payment for favorable coverage
editorialPolicy.independenceItem2: Clearly label any sponsored content (which is rare)
editorialPolicy.independenceItem3: Base recommendations solely on evidence and expert judgment
editorialPolicy.questionsText: We welcome questions about our editorial process. Please

methodology.pageDescription: Learn how CBD Portal evaluates and scores research quality. Our transparent 0-100 scoring system assesses study design, methodology, sample size, and relevance.
methodology.scoringSystemDesc: Every study receives a quality score based on four factors:
methodology.studyDesignDesc: The type of study determines the maximum evidence quality:
methodology.sampleSizeDesc: Larger studies provide more reliable results:
methodology.highQualityCardDesc: Results you can have reasonable confidence in
methodology.lowQualityCardDesc: Interesting but don't base decisions on it alone
methodology.transparencyItem1: We show the exact score breakdown on every study page
methodology.transparencyItem2: Our methodology is consistent across all studies in our database
methodology.transparencyItem3: We update scores when new information becomes available
methodology.transparencyItem4: We never adjust scores based on whether results favor CBD
methodology.limitationsItem2: A high score doesn't mean CBD "works" for a condition
methodology.limitationsItem3: A low score doesn't mean the research is worthless
methodology.limitationsItem4: Individual studies should be considered alongside the full body of research
methodology.questionsDesc: We're happy to explain our approach in more detail.

cookiePolicy.whatAreCookiesText: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.
cookiePolicy.howWeUseCookiesText: CBD Portal uses cookies for the following purposes:
cookiePolicy.essentialCookiesText: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility.
cookiePolicy.analyticsCookiesText: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
cookiePolicy.preferenceCookiesText: These cookies remember your preferences and settings to enhance your experience.
cookiePolicy.thirdPartyCookiesText: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages. We do not control these cookies. Third parties that may set cookies include:
cookiePolicy.thirdPartyGoogleAnalyticsText: For website analytics and performance monitoring
cookiePolicy.thirdPartyVercelText: Our hosting provider may set performance-related cookies
cookiePolicy.managingCookiesText: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can:
cookiePolicy.managingCookiesOption1: View what cookies are stored on your device
cookiePolicy.managingCookiesOption6: Receive a warning before a cookie is stored
cookiePolicy.impactText: If you disable cookies, some features of our website may not function properly. Essential cookies cannot be disabled as they are necessary for the site to work.
cookiePolicy.doNotTrackText: Some browsers have a "Do Not Track" feature that signals to websites that you do not want to have your online activity tracked. Our Site currently does not respond to "Do Not Track" signals.
cookiePolicy.updatesText: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
cookiePolicy.contactText: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at:
